fr:title.text: A History of Meta-gradient: Gradient Methods for Meta-learning

fr:frontmatter.fr:title: A History of Meta-gradient: Gradient Methods for Meta-learning
fr:frontmatter.fr:meta: @misc{suttonHistoryMetagradientGradient2022, title = {A {{History}} of {{Meta-gradient}}: {{Gradient Methods}} for {{Meta-learning}}}, author = {Sutton, Richard S.}, year = {2022}, urldate = {2024-09-06}, howpublished = {https://arxiv.org/abs/2202.09701v1}, journal = {arXiv.org}, file = {/home/kellen/Downloads/pdfs/storage/93SUJHK4/Sutton - 2022 - A History of Meta-gradient Gradient Methods for Meta-learning.pdf}, langid = {english}, abstract = {The history of meta-learning methods based on gradient descent is reviewed, focusing primarily on methods that adapt step-size (learning rate) meta-parameters.}, month = {February}, shorttitle = {A {{History}} of {{Meta-gradient}}} }
